```{r read-in-md, echo = FALSE}
library(magrittr)

add_external_md <- function(link) {
  # Note, the link needs to be to the *raw* file, e.g. : "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nhs-r-community/statements-on-tools/main/Open-Code.md"

readLines(link) %>%
    # remove title line
    {
    grep("^# ", ., value = T, invert = T)
    } %>%
    cat(sep = "\n")
}

```

# {- } 


In this book we've compiled a set of resources for anyone using data science tools within the NHS and beyond. These are taken directly from resources we created within [our GitHub repos](https://github.com/nhs-r-community). 

If you'd like to see additional resources included here, feel free to [open an issue](https://github.com/nhs-r-community/statements-on-tools/issues/) or contribute with a pull request.
